shared.a: Nope - just turn up. If you make it yay, if life gets in the way, such is life!
0-3 years is probably the best age, but if you need to bring older siblings, that's fine - drop us a message
Park on road by Strines Church - 30 second walk away
We have some toys, and the kids can play around whilst the adults chat

If the weather's nice, we have a slide and baby swing! The ground is quite boggy though, so full outdoor suits and outdoor shoes or wellies are recommended. We also have an indoor trampoline and plenty of room indoors.
As many as come. If it's many, great, if it's a few - also great.

shared.q: I don't know you very well, can I come?
shared.a: Yep - please do. If you're reading this, and your child is in the age range - please do

We'll do some snacky finger food like toast for the youth, but if there's snacks you think you or other adults would enjoy, please feel free to bring it along. Please only bring things you'd be willing to take home.
That's chill. Arrive when you arrive.

shared.q: Can I invite my friend with their kids?
shared.a: Probably, but drop us a line first

shared.q: Can we bring this specific toy or toys?
shared.a: err, sure? We have plenty, and anything you bring has a risk of getting lost - but if you think it'd be awesome, or work well for your child - please do!

shared.q: Why do you have such a slick website?
shared.a: Because "we" is often "I" and I, Tim am often bored and am a professional web developer - www.tdobson.net - so I built this "for fun".

shared.q: I can't make this one, will you do it again?
